summary: This document is an email from an unidentified sender to an unidentified recipient, dated October 1, 2021, containing an outline of cross-examination topics ('cross riffs') for an upcoming proceeding. The sender identifies themselves as the Deputy Chief of the Public Corruption Unit in the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit
persons.role: Deputy Chief, Public Corruption Unit, Southern District of New York
persons.context: The sender of the email, who is providing an outline of cross-examination topics for an upcoming proceeding.

events.title: Planned Cross-Examination
events.description: An upcoming proceeding where cross-examination is planned, as referenced in the email outlining 'cross riffs for tomorrow'.

keyFacts: The document is an email dated October 1, 2021, concerning preparation for a legal proceeding.
The sender is a Deputy Chief in the Public Corruption Unit of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The email's subject is 'Cross' and contains an outline of cross-examination topics ('riffs') for the following day.
The identities of the sender (beyond title) and recipient are not provided in the text.
The document indicates active legal case preparation by the Public Corruption Unit in late 2021.
